text: Trevor Baxter (18 November 1932 â€“ 16 July 2017) was a British actor and playwright. He was educated at Dulwich College and the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art. He was best known for playing Professor George Litefoot in Doctor Who. He was born in London. Baxter also appeared in Adam Adamant Lives!, Z-Cars, Maelstrom, Thriller, The New Avengers, Jack the Ripper, (1988) The Barchester Chronicles (1982) and Doctors. Baxter died on 16 July 2017 in London at the age of 84.RIP Trevor Baxter ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2017 deaths Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British stage actors Category:British playwrights Category:Writers from London Category:Actors from London
title: Trevor Baxter
